com.vmware.vcenter.datastore

Interface DefaultPolicy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService, DefaultPolicyTypes, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPolicyStub

    public interface DefaultPolicy
extends Service, DefaultPolicyTypes, com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService
    The DefaultPolicy interface provides methods related to storage policies associated with datastore object. The get(java.lang.String) method provides information about the default storage policy associated with the specific datastore. This interface was added in vSphere API 6.7.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  DefaultPolicy.GetInvocation
      Invocable that represents the DefaultPolicy#get vAPI operation.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DefaultPolicy.GetInvocation get(java.lang.String datastore)
      Returns the identifier of the current default storage policy associated with the specified datastore.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        DefaultPolicy.GetInvocation get(java.lang.String datastore)
        Returns the identifier of the current default storage policy associated with the specified datastore. This method was added in vSphere API 6.7.

        Invocation Result:
        Identifier of the default storage policy associated with the specified datastore. The return value will be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.vcenter.StoragePolicy. this field is null if there is no default storage policy associated with the datastore.

        Operation Errors:
        Error - if the system reports an error while responding to the request.
        NotFound - if the specified datastore does not exist.
        ServiceUnavailable - if the system is unable to communicate with a service to complete the request.
        Unauthenticated - if the user is not authenticated.
        Unauthorized - if the user does not have the required priveleges.

        Parameters:
        datastore - Identifier of the datastore for which the default policy is requested. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: Datastore.
        Returns:
        instance of DefaultPolicy.GetInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described get operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
